description: The shipbuilding workshop and headquarters of Tom's Workers, led by the legendary shipwright Tom. This is where Tom built the Oro Jackson and the Sea Train, and where he trained his apprentices Iceburg and Franky.

keyEvents.title: Pluton Blueprints Revealed
keyEvents.description: Tom retrieves the Pluton blueprints from a hidden safe at Tom's Workers and reveals them to his apprentices Iceburg and Franky.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the ancient weapon blueprints were kept hidden and where Tom made the critical decision to pass them to Iceburg.

keyEvents.title: Tom Entrusts Blueprints to Iceburg
keyEvents.description: At Tom's Workers, Tom makes the crucial decision to entrust the Pluton blueprints to Iceburg for safekeeping.
keyEvents.significance: This decision at Tom's Workers sets the course for the entire Water 7 arc.

statusHistory.reason: Operational during Tom's time as a shipwright
Disbanded after Tom's arrest and execution

description: The headquarters of the Franky Family, built on the remains of Tom's Workers. This is where Franky and his gang of ship dismantlers operate in the present timeline.

keyEvents.title: Lucci Arrives Demanding Pluton Blueprints
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci arrives at Franky House, examining the remains of Tom's Workers. He confronts Franky and demands the Pluton blueprints.
keyEvents.significance: The confrontation at Franky House confirms that Franky has the blueprints and escalates the conflict with CP9.

statusHistory.reason: Currently serves as Franky Family headquarters
